description: Creates a new invocation within a session. An invocation groups the related invocation steps that store the content from a conversation. For more information about sessions, see Store and retrieve conversation history and context with Amazon Bedrock sessions. Related APIs.

parameters.name: sessionIdentifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the associated session for the invocation. You can specify either the session's sessionId or its Amazon Resource Name (ARN).

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The timestamp for when the invocation was created.

nested_items.name: invocationId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier for the invocation.

nested_items.name: sessionId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier for the session associated with the invocation.
